ygData.subject: Re: OOC: Optimus Prime went to War
ygData.msgSnippet: Yeah, Prime used to hang around some of the bigger TF message boards. Mostly Bottal.com like Stac said. I may have talked to him on the Allspark or the TF

Yeah, Prime used to hang around some of the bigger TF message boards. Mostly Bottal.com like Stac said. I may have talked to him on the Allspark or the TF World 2005 boards also.
If this is the same article that I read earlier then he says that after he sent in the papers for the name change to the military he got a letter back from a general at the Pentagon. The general said, "It's good to know we have the commander of the Autobots in the US Armed Forces." Or something like that. I find that funny. People everywhere know Transformers.
 EmprzAnastazia@... wrote:In a message dated 3/24/03 1:47:40 AM Central Standard Time, airly2002@... writes:


Hey pals!

I know that OOC's are anoying but this link has soemthing courious

http://www.wkyc.com/news/news_fullstory.asp?id=3828




Yup... he's a member of the Bottalk.com transfan message board. Last I knew he was being shipped over to that area for sure, but I am still trying to confirm that. Difficult to confirm who went over where, since everything is so quiet. I can understand why, though. 

Our thoughts & prayers now must be with Prime in this war. Considering how much it has stepped up in intensity. 

Stac
